programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Ricky and Bubba take on a flea-market king in the city of Garland; Jenny and Mary discover an armory; Vic returns with a new protege.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Ricky and Bubba's nemesis resurfaces in the city of Mesquite; Jenny and Mary uncover a Cold War relic; a struggling Victor searches for bargains.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.sub-title: You Bought It, You Break It
programme.desc: The buyers return to Mesquite; Jenny battles a work-related injury; Moe and Mary's finds get them jumping and dancing.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The auction heads to Irving, Texas; Lesa and Moe go toe-to-toe for a unit with a mystical item; Victor flips a small locker for twenty-five times his initial investment; and Ricky and Bubba hit pay dirt with a locker containing sci-fi memorabilia.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Fort Worth, a perilous place in the 1800s, is a host to one more showdown when Matt moseys in and pushes his weight around.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Moe and Mary try to choose a team name; Victor wears camouflage hunting gear; Jenny battles with Mary over a unit with glass blowing items; Ricky and Bubba get a lesson on drugs.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The "Storage Wars" spread to the Lone Star state; the buyers have to be at the top of their game; like oil, these lockers look crude, but to the trained eye, they're as good as gold.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Victor hopes a return to the town of Waxahachie will stop his losing streak; Moe and Mary believe an antique instrument will yield big returns; Bubba and Ricky reel in a surprise.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Bubba returns to Killeen, Texas, where he attended high school; Victor unearths Civil War collectibles; Jenny attempts to crack a safe.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers head to Las Vegas, where they soon learn the rules of the auction game have changed; Jarrod takes on the big dogs; Darrell locates a unit with golden potential.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: An expensive jewelry box in discovered among the treasures in Huntington Beach, Calif.; Darrell attempts to reel in a unit; Barry eyes military antiques.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Simi Valley, Calif., the buyers deal with safes, a pirate's booty and a vintage motorcycle; Dave is left with a broken heart.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Darrell plays a hunch in Highland, Calif., while Jarrod and Brandi experience royal pains; Barry follows signs to a potential profit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: All's Fair in Storage and Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi look to score in Laguna Niguel, Calif.; Barry cuts the competition to pieces; a new buyer arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: The Kook, the Chief, His Son, and the Brothers
programme.desc: The buyers encounter fierce competition from "The Kings of Swag" in Lake Elsinore, Calif.; Jarrod and Brandi feud; an item has an astronomical price tag.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers visit Orange, Calif.; Ivy Calvin finds collectibles in the garbage; Jarrod and Brandi hope to earn a profit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers roll into Compton, Calif.; Jarrod gets a new nickname; Mike purchases a locker that Herb doesn't want; Barry is reunited with his old friend Kenny.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Rene and Casey take on rival couple Jarrod and Brandi; Darrell wins an intriguing locker after dodging a bullet; Ivy encounters a furry friend.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy searches for high-end lockers; Rene and Casey clash over purchases; things get hairy for Jarrod and Brandi; Darrell plays old-fashioned pranks on his rivals.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Darrell and Brandon score big when when the buyers return to Moreno Valley, Calif.; Mary Padian looks for romance and attractive units.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers descend upon Riverside, Calif., where Mary hopes to dial up some luck and Brandi tries to stay positive for Jarrod.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dave goes after Jarrod and Brandi at a first-class auction in Arcadia, Calif.; Ivy makes an early move; Mary struggles to keep up with the competition amid soaring prices.

programme.desc: Darrell defends his turf when the buyers descend upon Costa Mesa, Calif.; Ivy Calvin comes across a unique tool; Jarrod and Brandi seek store stock.
